name: Bytedance Seedream V4 Text to Image Generator Kie AI
description:
Generate images from text prompts using the ByteDance Seedream V4 model via the kie.ai API. Can generate several images at once.
Pricing (as of November 2025):  ~$0.0175 per image.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

seed.description: Optional integer for random seed to control the stochasticity of image generation. Defaults to None (omit if not provided). No seed equal random generation. Same seed equal reproducible results.

filename.description: Optional string for base filename (without extension); defaults to None (uses task_id)

image_resolution.description: Optional image resolution. Must be one of '1K', '2K', '4K', or empty. Defaults to None (omit for API default)

max_images.description: Optional max number of images to generate. Must be 1-6. Defaults to 1. You should also state the exact number you want in the prompt so both settings align.

prompt.description: The text prompt describing the image to generate. Max length : 5000 characters.

image_size.description: Optional image aspect ratio, must be one of 'square', 'square_hd', 'portrait_4_3', 'portrait_3_2', 'portrait_16_9', 'landscape_4_3', 'landscape_3_2', 'landscape_16_9', 'landscape_21_9', or empty. Defaults to None (omit for API default)

saved_images_paths.description: List of local paths where images were saved

task_id.description: The task ID from the API

temporary_image_urls.description: List of temporary URLs for the generated images
